registerOnMouseOverEvent Name
 Adds an Function that is called everytime Mouse is over the Button.

Detailed Description

Creates an Button that changes Background Images on MouseOver and Out.

Button can hold an image if activatet.

Member Function Documentation

Button::asdf_Button ( _id  ,
_parent  ,
positionX  ,
positionY  ,
image_normal  ,
image_active  ,
image_hover  ,
extra_css_class   
) [inline, private]

Create a Button - but images dont show up till Button.show() is called.

Parameters:
 id string unique Id for the Element (used also for the HTML elements)
 _parent Element parent Element (need to know where HTML elements add to)
 positionX int x Position of the Button - relative to parent
 positionY int y Position of the Button - relative to parent
 image_normal string Path to Image that showed if nothing is done to the Button
 image_active string Path to Image that showd if Button is activated. Default: = image_normal
 image_hover string Path to Image that showed if Mouse is over Button. Default: =image_normal
 extra_css string Name of extra css_classes for the HTML Object
